meanings.definition: A person who edits or revises a text for publication.
meanings.sent1: The redactors carefully reviewed the manuscript before it went to print.
meanings.sent2: The redactors made sure the book was error-free before it was published.
meanings.sent3: The redactors found a funny typo in the document and fixed it before printing.
meanings.sent4: The redactors were like detectives, uncovering hidden mistakes in the text.
meanings.sent5: The redactors were the unsung heroes behind the polished final version of the book.
